column2: Sweet, dude, I'm happy for you! Keep pushing, you're an inspiration.
Finally, bizarre how long it took.
Why didnt optic pick him up after optic arena
Grats wizzrobe. You've deserved a sponser for a long time.
But does this mean you will be reaping their colors? White and Pink Falcon???
YAAS. Awesome bro. It cracked me up that right after you stopped being on Team Frye that you took a 1st place at that major. Good stuff WizzY. Happy for you.
Well deserved Wizzy! I love watching you kick ass
Congrats Wizzy! It's been a long time coming, well earned!!
Was a long time coming. Sort of sickening you weren't snatched up sooner. #Wizzrobe
Congrats Wizzy. I'm sure you will crush it with ExcelerateGG, looking forward to the journey.

Best of luck and congrats Wizzy. I hope they take care of you. *:)*
Never heard of them but you committing to a team must mean the offer was good (which you deserve). Good to hear.
congrats wizzy B) best falcon out there!
W I Z Z R O D
I'm so happy for you man. You've been putting in so much work
